metadata.name: Make a Masterpiece
metadata.description:
CHAPTER 00
Introduction to 'Make a Masterpiece'


Suture with his tendons
Stained with her blood
Woven with their skin.


Himuro Akito, the last boy who survived the ritual sacrifice and massacre of Himuro Mansion.

In the early Showa year, after being rescued by the police, Akito was adopted by an artist who owns an art museum. This made him interest in art and literature. Until becoming the creator of the masterpiece works from the dead with the blood, flesh and bone of many sacrifice victims from Himuro family and all over the world.
